 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
es.ull.iis.function Provides classes which can define time-depending functions.
es.ull.iis.simulation.condition The Condition interface and some predefined conditions.
es.ull.iis.simulation.core The package that store the common Simulation objects.
es.ull.iis.simulation.core.flow Classes required to define workflows
es.ull.iis.simulation.examples Provides several examples to test the library.
es.ull.iis.simulation.examples.WFP Provides several examples focusing in control-flow workflow patterns.
es.ull.iis.simulation.factory Factories of simulation objects, required when dynamic compilation is needed, or in case the simulation is going to be created from other application.
es.ull.iis.simulation.info Classes declaring the pieces of information that the simulation emits and a user can handle by means of the InfoReceiver interface.
es.ull.iis.simulation.inforeceiver Core classes and interfaces that handle the information produced by the execution of the simulation model.
es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel Provides the core classes necessary to create any model and to simulate it.
es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.factory Factories of simulation objects, required when dynamic compilation is needed.
es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow Classes required to define workflows.
es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential Provides the core classes necessary to create any model and to simulate it.
es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.factory Factories of simulation objects, required when dynamic compilation is needed.
es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow Classes required to define workflows.
es.ull.iis.simulation.variable The Variable interface and some primitive type variables.
es.ull.iis.util Provides miscellaneous utility classes, such as simulation cycle management (Cycle, CycleIterator...), complex data structures (PrioritizedMap), and other utilities (ClassPathHacker, RandomPermutation).
simkit.random
